description: This source file provides functions for generating test case specifications and pytest test modules based on requirement dictionaries. It includes templates for common test scenarios such as login and search, and creates test scripts with steps and a conftest configuration for base URL options.

methods.name: Tuple[List[Dict],List[str]] generate_testcases_and_code(requirements: List[Dict], base_dir: str)

methods.name: str _infer_rule_key(req: Dict)
methods.description: Infers a rule key ('login', 'search', or 'generic') based on requirement title and description.

methods.name: Dict _generic_template(req: Dict)
methods.description: Provides a generic test template for requirements that do not match specific rules.

methods.name: str _emit_pytest_module(test_name: str, steps: List[str])
methods.description: Creates the content of a pytest test module as a string, including steps and a basic assertion.

methods.name: str _emit_conftest()
methods.description: Generates the contents of a conftest.py file for pytest configuration, especially setting base URL options.
